WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

I tried to use root\cimv2\Security\MicrosoftVolumeEncryption but it wouldn't be found in WPP. Any tip, on how I can create an installable rule with this Namespace?

Regards
Norbert

Comments.Message:
WPP query the local computer to list WMI namespaces. May be this namespace is not declared on this computer.
If so, you can just copy/paste this namespace in the textbox.

If I copy it to the TextBox, it gets cut down to root\cimv2\Security maybe a bug?

Regards
Norbert

I don't have this behavior.
Do you copy in the textbox (first window) or in the comboBox that list all namespaces (second window) ?
OK, thats working. Issue can be closed.
I modify the behavior of the "WMI namespaces" window to copy the Text from the combobox to the TextBox if the user paste a unkown namespace.
